title: Tile Editor Tool
subtitle: Unity Tool Programming | Custom Editor | Level Design
content: Unity Tool Programming - A customizable tile editor tool to create levels!
status: Development Complete and used in game
description: An in-editor Unity Tool created using Unity and C# to assist developers/designers alike to easily populate a variety of tiles to make a level.
roles: Designed the tool to optimize level designing process
Development of the tile editor UI windows and tool logic to create different palettes of tiles
Integration of this tool into a Tower Defense game prototype
details: The project delves into custom tool programming within Unity & C#, aimed at expediting game development processes. In order to facilitate level designers in swiftly exploring their level prototypes, a 3D tile editor tool has been developed. This tool offers the following functionalities: Customizable Tile Palette: Users can create a personalized tile palette by adding tiles of their choice. 3D Grid-Based System: The tool establishes a 3D grid-based system, enhancing the level's visibility and enabling users to paint tiles more efficiently. By integrating these features, the tool empowers designers to create levels at a faster pace, thus streamlining the development workflow.
